title: Your Subscription
cancel_confirmation: Are you sure you want to cancel your Pro subscription?
cancel_info_1: You will continue to have access to Pro features until the end of your current billing period.
cancel_info_2: You can resubscribe at any time.
cancel_info_3: No refunds are provided for partial billing periods.
cancel_success_message: Your subscription has been successfully cancelled.
cancel_end_date: You will have access to Pro features until {{date}}.
error_loading: Error loading subscription information. Please try again later.
error_cancel: Error cancelling subscription. Please try again later.
